Introduction

INTER GIRLS was a South Korean girl group under Inter B.D Entertainment. They released a digital single on March 23, 2022. The group underwent several lineup changes before their presumed disbandment in early 2023.

Dara and Soul joined the group in August 2022, replacing Aire and Leena who were presumed to have left the group. Rika became a new member in September 2022, after Soul’s departure.

The group’s official SNS accounts became inactive, their Instagram account was deleted, and some of the trainees returned to Yoma Entertainment. It is presumed that they disbanded between February and March 2023.
